raw akas.title: We Without Wings: Under the Innocent Sky

akas: Ore-tachi ni Tsubasa wa Nai (original title)
We Without Wings: Under the Innocent Sky World-wide (English title)
akas from release info: Ore-tachi ni Tsubasa wa Nai (original title)
We Without Wings: Under the Innocent Sky World-wide (English title)

1.title: For Example, That Kind of Fairytale

episode of.title: We Without Wings: Under the Innocent Sky (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: DJ Condor is your guide as the everyday lives of several young city-dwellers come into focus on the streets of Yanagihara, a bustling metropolis where there's no shortage of stories.

2.title: The Animal I Like Is the Pegasus

episode of.title: We Without Wings: Under the Innocent Sky (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: Kobato Is Cute, Huh?

episode of.title: We Without Wings: Under the Innocent Sky (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: After arriving for his first shift at Karuo's Alexander, Shusuke learns he'll be trained by Hiyoko. Later, when the YFB rumbles with R-Wing, Hayato finds himself in the middle of the action.

4.title: Drac... I May Have Gotten Pregnant...

episode of.title: We Without Wings: Under the Innocent Sky (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Ai and Naru create a few awkward situations while competing for Hayato's attention. Meanwhile, some truly unusual events unfold at Alexander involving Kakeru, Shusuke, and a bizarre - and violent - customer.

5.title: O, How Virtuous Is Our Honored Hawk!

episode of.title: We Without Wings: Under the Innocent Sky (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Takashi may have trouble grasping the various conditions that go along with "dating" Asuka, but that's nothing compared to facing ten thousand monsters on the field of battle!

6.title: Eek! No, I'll Make Noise!

episode of.title: We Without Wings: Under the Innocent Sky (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Chitose gets an eyeful when a grateful Hiyoko tenderly dresses his wound. Later, Drac warns Otori about a dangerous man in a hat.

7.title: Your King's Glorious Return!

episode of.title: We Without Wings: Under the Innocent Sky (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: Garuda, the King of Gretagard, seizes control of Hayato Narita's body and reunites with his old friend Phoenix. When the king's lusty desires lead him to Kobato, familial relations get super creepy!

8.title: No Big-Busted Cream Girl Yet?!

episode of.title: We Without Wings: Under the Innocent Sky (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: When Lord Hawk is pierced by a poisoned blade, Sparrow uses her body as a tool to help him expel the venom. Back at school, Takashi gets caught in a tug-of-war between a bossy blonde and a Watarai.

9.title: My Heart Is Heaving!!

episode of.title: We Without Wings: Under the Innocent Sky (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: Shusuke assumes control of Takashi for the day, Hiyoko hears some heartbreaking criticism of her latest literary effort, and Naru recruits some friends to help find her missing bicycle.

10.title: Please, Always Be a Fan, Okay?

episode of.title: We Without Wings: Under the Innocent Sky (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: Hayato quickly handles the all-important grad essay situation, and Shusuke manages to save Hiyoko's writing career.

11.title: Are You Familiar with the Concept of Little Sister Moe?

episode of.title: We Without Wings: Under the Innocent Sky (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: Haneda's day out features a slightly creepy conversation on the forbidden secrets of little sister moe, and Watarai gets physical when her boyfriend disappears into his dreamland!

12.title: We With(Out) Wings...

episode of.title: We Without Wings: Under the Innocent Sky (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: As Haneda slowly lets go of his fantasy world, he discovers the reason for his very existence and reaches out to those who helped him along the way.

13.title: 90 Percent of More Skin

episode of.title: We Without Wings: Under the Innocent Sky (TV Series 2011– )

imdb.plot outline: Haneda Takashi has a secret he cannot speak of. To leave his dull school-life, he was supposed to have escaped to another world. However, he is reeled in by certain ties on his heart. One of these is Kobato, his awkward younger sister. The other is Watarai Asuka, his negligent girlfriend. Chitose Shuusuke is a poor freeloader. He passes his days working at various part-time jobs. One day, he has a disastrous first encounter with Tamaizumi Hiyoko. The next time they meet, Shuusuke discovers that they are fellow employees at his part-time job. Narita Hayato sees himself as a "hard-boiled" person. Back-breaking jobs are nothing to him. Hayato shuns normal human contact, but, during the nights, he would get together with delinquents and other denizens of the night. One such night, he meets the cheerful and oblivious Otori Naru. The relationships with these girls will greatly affect these 3 young men. But what, exactly, is the relationship these young men have with each other?
